THE GAME :

Morph’em (Morphem) is a free word game in 3D with a real-time permanent competition.

A new round starts every 4 minutes. Play live against people from all around the world!

Gameplay principles:
  • Drag your finger to create words
  • Rotate the cube to find more words
  • Find the 6 bonus words to optimize your points
  • 3 powers-ups to use to help you beat your opponents
  • Complete statistics to check and improve your game
  • 55 trophies to unlock
  • A training mode to learn the game or to play offline
Customize your game :
  • 24 color themes
  • More than 100 avatar icons
  • Editable nickname


REVIEW QUOTES :

Morph'em will certainly get the old brain matter working overtime and the game could well turn out to be extremely addictive, due to a combination of its glorious graphics and interesting game play."
